Uses of Class
screens.Screen

    screens  

    • Uses of Screen in screens

      Subclasses of Screen in screens 
      Modifier and Type Class Description
      class  BackgroundSelect
      The background selector screen.
      class  GameOver
      Is the opening screen which the player will see when they first launch the game, die, or want to quit
      class  Instructions
      Represents the instructions of the game
      class  MainGame
      Represents the main game screen.
      class  MainMenu
      Is the opening screen which the player will see when they first launch the game, die, or want to quit
      class  PlayerSelect
      The player selection menu screen.
